name: WP Post Disclaimer
author: Krunal Prajapati

sections.description:
Add a disclaimer/terms/warnings about post/page/custom post type on top, bottom of content as well as inside post content

Features

  • Disclaimer on Post/Page or Custom Post Type
  • Customized Options
  • Custom CSS Option
  • Individual Post/Page or Custom Post Type Options
  • Font Awesome Icons
  • Use with Shortcode
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

Login to your WordPress dashboard and navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New”

In the search input type “WP Post Disclaimer” then hit enter. Once you have found a plugin, you can view details about plugin and you can install it by click “Install Now” and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual Installation

Download “WP Post Disclaimer” plugin and upload it to your server via your FTP. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to doing this here.

Once installation done, then go to Dashboard > Settings > WP Post Disclaimer and then set up all the options as per your need and enjoy the plugin!
sections.faq:
Where can I find WP Post Disclaimer Global Settings?

You can find them under Dashboard > Settings > WP Post Disclaimer

Where can I find individual WP Post Disclaimer Settings?

You can find them under post edit screen > WP Post Disclaimer

  • Add – WPML config file
  • Fix – Strip slashes for quotes in disclaimer content.

Version 1.0.1 – 06-05-2020

  • Fix – Metabox icon update issue
  • Add – “None” Option for icon to hide Icon

Version 1.0.0 – 10-01-2020
